Uses of Class
jGame.core.ui.hud.Constraints

Packages that use Constraints
Package Description
jGame.core.ui.hud
This package contains classes responsible for implementing a HUD system, with a central class (UIHud) maintaining a list of elements to be displayed after the game updates.

  • Uses of Constraints in jGame.core.ui.hud

    Returns the default constraints to apply to a UIHudElement.
    Methods in jGame.core.ui.hud with parameters of type Constraints
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void UIHudElement.setDrawConstraints​(Constraints drawConstraints)
    Resets the new draw constraints for this elements.
